original_text: (For only Og the king of Bashan was left of the remnant of the Rephaim. Behold, his bed was a bed of iron. Is it not in Rabbah of the Ammonites? Nine cubits was its length, and four cubits its breadth, according to the common cubit.)
korean_text: (르바임 족속의 남은 자는 바산 왕 옥뿐이었으며 그의 침상은 철 침상이라 아직도 암몬 족속의 랍바에 있지 아니하냐 그것을 사람의 보통 규빗으로 재면 그 길이가 아홉 규빗이요 너비가 네 규빗이니라)

sentences.original_text: For only Og the king of Bashan was left
of the remnant of the Rephaim
Behold, his bed was a bed of iron
Is it not in Rabbah of the Ammonites?
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 암몬 자손의 랍바에 있지 아니하느냐
